title: Suggest a conference feature
body_html:
Students can choose a conference from our list in their profile. However it's possible, that there is a cool local conference which we don't know about.

I think we should add a text field where a student can suggest a conference.
Something like "Here you can suggest a conference you would like to attend as a part of the RGSoC program" [text-field].

In rgsoc-teams/app/views/users/edit.html.slim: the field should be available regardless the conditions: - if current_season.started? and - if Conference.any?

In rgsoc-teams/app/views/users/show.html.slim: the field should be displayed regardless the condition - if @user.conferences.any?, but there should be another condition (that the field if filled out).

body:
Students can choose a conference from our list in their profile. However it's possible, that there is a cool local conference which we don't know about. 

![screen shot 2016-06-23 at 23 11 45](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1745735/16320648/32647eb2-3999-11e6-96f7-d536125f4926.png)

I think we should add a text field where a student can suggest a conference.
Something like "Here you can suggest a conference you would like to attend as a part of the RGSoC program" [text-field].

In `rgsoc-teams/app/views/users/edit.html.slim`: the field should be available regardless the conditions: `- if current_season.started?` and `- if Conference.any?`

In `rgsoc-teams/app/views/users/show.html.slim`: the field should be displayed regardless the condition `- if @user.conferences.any?`, but there should be another condition (that the field if filled out).
